markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Lament](/Spells.aspx?ID=2407)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 269

**Domain**
[Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=117)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30-foot  [cone](/Rules.aspx?ID=2386)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) will

</row>

</column>

---

You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies’ hearts and deals 1d8 [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) damage (basic Will save) to each creature in the area. If you have any harmful conditions imposed by [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590) effects, lament deals additional mental damage equal to the [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=3280) rank of the highest-level effect. 

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Lament

text: Lament Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 269 Domain Sorrow Range 30-foot cone Defense basic will --- You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies’ hearts and deals 1d8 mental damage (basic Will save) to each creature in the area. If you have any harmful conditions imposed by emotion effects, lament deals additional mental damage equal to the counteract rank of the highest-level effect. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
